comments:
Build ID: I20070323-1616

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Generate an entity from a table whom is referenced on a couple hundred other tables by using its primary key as a foreign key.


More information:
So far I have not had any problems generating entities except for this table. The only thing I have been able to come up with that distinguishes itself from the rest of my tables is the amount of tables it references. Here is the stack trace I receieved:
